title: 1987 8th Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Has fungal decay and is 50% dead, upon being monitored for several months its condition worsened, has experienced large limb failure which has weakened the structure and allows for more decay; Forest Hill

title: 489 Colon Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Cabling is failing to keep tree intact, crown is thinning, main unions have decay and new cracks are forming, removal or reduction of limbs will eliminate canopy and acacia cannot compartmentalize decay, slowly failing; can be replaced and while it is not adjacent homeowner's responsibility we will ask if they would be willing to water a tree from BUF

title: 105 Danvers Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (787958); significant root decay, heart rot present in trunk; can be replaced, but site must be shifted south to move 25ft from STOP sign
